subtitle: Making money by trading in share market is not easy but if you follow simple steps then you can become a successful trader.
Number one you have to learn the basics of trading.
Once you learn the basic then the second step is to learn the strategies.
You have to learn strategies and on number three you bake them.
Now after backtesting, see which streets have been more profitable.
After that you pick a strategy.
After picking the streets, on number five.
Now in demo trading, when the results are seen, the next step is to do live trading.
When you trade live, after that you create a trading plan and continuously review your plan and this.
If you want to invest in stock market or want to trade then you will get the link of free demat account in the description comment box and in the bio.
